medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was in his usual state of health until last night when he began to experience pain. The pain progressively localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). While in the ED, the patient became nauseous, vomited, and had one episode of non-bloody diarrhea. He denies fever but has had chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of right inguinal hernia repair as child.
